titles: The repairer of the breach a sermon preached at the cathedral church of Glocester, May 29, 1660, being the anniversary of His Maiesty's birth-day, and happy entrance into his emperial city of London / by Thomas Washbourn.
author: Washbourne, Thomas, 1606-1687.
notes: Error in paging: p. 3 unnumbered, p. 5, 20-21, 24-25 misnumbered 7, 25-24, 21-20.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
